Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.craftar

Interface Summary
CraftARContentDownloadProgressHandler Interface used to receive feedback of the downloading progress of a CraftARTrackingContent3DModel.
CraftARImageHandler Interface that receives the responses of the calls to CraftARCamera.takePicture()
CraftARResponseHandler Interface to receive the responses from the CraftARCloudRecognition.
CraftARTouchEventInterface.OnContentClickListener Interface that lets you define the behavior for click events on the Augmented Reality contents.
CraftARTouchEventInterface.OnTouchEventListener Interface that lets you define the behavior for touch events on the Augmented Reality contents.
CRSConnectHandler Implemented by the CraftARCloudRecognition class to receive the network responses from the CRSConnect.
OnTrackingExpired Implement this interface if you want to override the behaviour when the free trial of 90 seconds expires.
 

Class Summary
CraftARActivity Activities using the CraftARSDK must extend CraftARActivity instead of Activity.
CraftARCamera Used to manage functions related to the camera.
CraftARCameraView View where the SDK knows how to draw the camera capture and the AR contents.
CraftARCloudRecognition Module that interacts with the CRS service.
CraftARCloudRecognitionError Describes an error that happened while performing calls to the cloud
CraftARCloudRecognitionError.ErrorCodes Error codes received from the CraftAR API
CraftARImage Class that wraps a jpeg image using the optimal resolution and compression.
CraftARItem Contains an item from a cloud search.
CraftARItemAR CraftARItem that handles an Augmented Reality experience.
CraftARItemFactory Parses the CraftARItem from a JSON object and detects if is an AR or IR item (Augmented Reality or Image Recognition only).
CraftARResponseHandler.RequestCodes Request codes for the #requestFailedResponse() method of the CraftARResponseHandler class.
CraftARSDK The CraftARSDK is the module that let's you access all the other modules.
CraftARTouchEventInterface  
CraftARTracking Module that manages the AR experience allowing to add AR items and contents and rendering the contents in the camera preview.
CraftARTrackingContent Abstract class for a content that can be drawn on top of a reference image for a CraftARItemAR.
CraftARTrackingContent3dmodel A 3d model content for a CraftARItemAR
CraftARTrackingContentFactory Creates a CraftARTrackingContent from a CRS response's content item in the JSON.
CraftARTrackingContentImage An Image content for a CraftARItemAR
CraftARTrackingContentImageButton An ImageButton content for a CraftARItemAR
CraftARTrackingContentVideo A Video content for a CraftARItemAR
CRSConnect CRSConnect allows you to send requests to the CraftAR Recognition Server.
CRSConnect.Request Request codes for the CRSConnectHandler class.
 

Exception Summary
CraftARSDKException Manages internal exceptions occurred within the CraftAR SDK
